trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around February 3rd 2010
divs: sighting detailson 2\3\10, i was driving westbound on the i -10 freeway near downtown la, returning from work. i saw a wingless craft with glowing red and green lights come out of the cloud cover straight ahead through my windshield. the craft was moving fast,in a near-vertical descent, and fell maybe one thousand feet before finally leveling off a bit, about 1 or 2 hundred feet for the ground. this was near the i-10 and 110 exchange, near downtown. i watched it for a total of about 20 seconds. i was sure at first i was seeing a small plane out of control and crashing. it was silent however, and had no wings; just two large lights, one red, one green. the descent was swift, extreme, and precluded helicopters, etc. when it leveled out a bit it vanished in a puff of smoke or vapor, after traveling towards downtown for several more seconds. i expected to hear a crash and see an explosion, but it had simply vanished
Summary: red and green craft in near vertical descent by downtown LA, vanishes in a puff of vapor
